title: CFR's Shannon O'Neil: Going Back a Century on Venezuela
description: Shannon O’Neil, Council on Foreign Relations senior vice president and director of studies, says the Venezuela shift is mostly about leadership, not policy. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” the Trump administration is prioritizing stability and oil flows over democratic transition, with limited engagement with opposition figures. (Source: Bloomberg)
